S03n234:3: bodhisattvaḥ kilānalpakālasvabhyastapuṇyakarmā sātmībhūtapradānadamasaṃyamakaruṇaḥ parahitaniyatakriyātiśayaḥ kadācicchakro devānāmindro babhūva |
S03n234:10: tasya divaspṛthivyoḥ samyakparipālanopārjitāṃ sarvalokānuvyāpinīṃ kīrtisampadaṃ tāṃ ca lakṣmīmatyadbhutāmamṛṣyamāṇā daityagaṇāḥ kalpanāṭopabhīṣaṇataradviradarathaturagapadātinā kṣubhitasāgaraghoranirghoṣeṇa jājvalyamānavividhapraharaṇāvaraṇadurnirīkṣyeṇa mahatā balakāyena yuddhāyainamabhijagmuḥ |
S03n234:15: atha sa mahāsattvasturagavarasahasrayuktamabhyucchritārhadvasanacihnaruciradhvajaṃ vividhamaṇiratnadīptivyavabhāsitamatijvaladvapuṣaṃ kalpanāvibhāgopaniyataniśitajvalitavividhāyudhavirājitobhayapārśvaṃ pāṇḍukambalinaṃ haimaṃ rathavaramabhiruhya mahatā hastyaśvarathapadātivicitreṇa devānīkena parivṛtastadasurasainyaṃ samudratīrānta eva pratyujjagāma |
S03n234:18: tiṣṭha naivamitaḥ paśya kvedānīṃ manna mokṣyase |
S03n234:29: rathena viṣṭabhya balaṃ tu vidviṣāṃ surendra ekaḥ samare vyatiṣṭhata ||10 ||
S03n234:30: abhyudīrṇaṃ tvāsuraṃ balamatiharṣātpaṭutarotkruṣṭakṣveḍitasiṃhanādamabhipatitamabhisamīkṣya mātalirdevendrasārathiḥ svaṃ ca balaṃ palāyanaparamavetyāpayānamatra prāptakālamiti matvā devādhipateḥ syandanamāvartayāmāsa |
S03n234:31: atha śakro devendraḥ samutpatato ratheṣāgrābhimukhānyabhighātapathāgatāni śālmalīvṛkṣe garuḍanīḍānyapaśyat |
S03n234:32: dṛṣṭvaiva ca karuṇayā samālambyamānahṛdayo mātaliṃ saṃgrāhakamityuvāca-
S03n234:34: amī pateyurna yathā ratheṣayā vicūrṇitā vāhaya me rathaṃ tathā ||11 ||
S03n234:35: mātaliruvāca-amī tāvanmārṣa samabhiyānti no daityasaṃghā iti |
S03n234:39: nivartanādasya rathasya kevalaṃ śivaṃ bhavedamburuhākṣa pakṣiṇām |
S03n234:40: cirasya labdhaprasarā sureṣvasāvabhidravatyeva tu no dviṣaccamūḥ ||12 ||
S03n234:41: atha śakro devendraḥ svamadhyāśayātiśayaṃ sattvaviśeṣaṃ ca kāruṇyaviśeṣāt prakāśayannuvāca-
S03n234:46: atha mātalistatheti pratiśrutya turagasahasrayuktaṃ syandanamasya nivartayāmāsa |
S03n234:47: dṛṣṭāvadānā ripavastu tasya yuddhe samālokya rathaṃ nivṛttam |
S03n234:51: nirīkṣya bhagnaṃ tu tadāsuraṃ balaṃ surendrasenāpyatha sā nyavartata |
S03n234:52: babhūva naiva praṇayaḥ suradviṣāṃ bhayadrutānāṃ vinivartituṃ yataḥ ||16 ||
S03n234:55: evaṃ sa eva tasya saṃgrāmasya vijayo babhūva |
S03n234:61: tadevaṃ devarājyaṃ prāṇānapi parityajya dīrgharātraṃ paripālitāni bhagavatā sattvāni |
S03n234:62: teṣviha prājñasyāghāto na yuktarūpaḥ prāgeva vipratipattiriti prāṇiṣu dayāyattenāryeṇa bhavitavyam |
S03n234:63: tathā hi dharmo ha vai rakṣati dharmacāriṇamityatrāpyunneyam |
